extendedInfo.description: See fossils, remains of many species from hundred millions years old to those of recent species. All these data of Archaeology, paleontology, anthropology and History are gathered in one place, one application, at your fingertips !See different species from jurassic carnivores or plant eating dinosaurs, predators or hunters like Tyranosaurus rex, velociraptor to hominini, Australopithecus & Paranthopus, proto-humans & humans. View a gallery of discoveries, the fossils of dinos, hominids, Homo erectus, Handy man, workman, the hobbit, the neanderthal man, homo sapiens sapiens, the taung child or see the remains of "natural spring". Observe relations between species (see coexisting species) and learn more with an original timeline !â¥ "This app is really cool! I recommend it for u science freaks out there. It is good for studies. Oh, and there are hobbit skulls on there. :) five star really cool." [Dawgzâ¦â¦]â¥ "Love it! It revitalized my interest in physical anthropology and human evolution!" [Westâ¦â¦]â¥ "Superb App Great pocket guide to our human ancestry." [Daryâ¦â¦]â¥ "Excellent. The best app..out there. if you're interested in human evolution..and more..." [Birâ¦â¦]â¥ "I think this app is really cool. Definitely recommend it to anyone who is interested in archaeology and anthropology." [Skyeâ¦â¦]â¥ "Incredible A++++ Love it as an anthropology and archaeology major this is so great to have at hand." [Durhâ¦â¦]â¥ "Fantastic - Great resource all in one place. Love it [David Joâ¦â¦]â¥ "Great work - Fantastic [Mat Crisâ¦â¦]â¥ "Great gathering of fossil images and data. Thank you" [User]â¥ "This app is helping me through my anthropology exams very nicely. Love it!" [User]Main features:ââ  200 fossils and remains available (dinosaurs, hominids remains, bones, skulls, skeletons, cast ...) !â  zoom on images to see details and get more informationâ  time range bar to select a time interval for species or edit numbers manually (e.g. discover species that share the same period of time)â  search for âco-existing speciesâ (same temporal range), see available fossils and get more informationâ  quick search within temporal range, scientific classification, species, dates, location, discovery information, measures ...!â  use geologic time scales like prehistoric ages, holocene, pleistocene, pliocene, miocene, cretaceous or jurassic to filter speciesâ  Discoveries gallery with a timeline associated : browse history with the discovered remains and fossilsâ  Complete offline mode : fetch data for offline use, retrieve all data (see "+" button in discovery tab)Contact us if you want to publish or share your data with Sapiens.

reviews.title: excellent beyond belief
reviews.comment: dont need internet to use this once downloaded....i love the pictures and the stories behind them....alot of work went into this....thanks
reviews.author: karen williams

reviews.comment: It\'s a great app!!
reviews.author: Peter Lakos

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Would have been better if the info wasnt from wikipedia but such a good app. Makes all the info condensed and easy to find in one place
reviews.author: William Casey

reviews.title: Don\'t quote it, but great starting point
reviews.comment: Great consolidated resource. If you are truly interested in the topic you\'ll need to do additional research, but that is true with any source of information
reviews.author: BLARGH Smith

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: I was hoping to find some decent information but all of the sources are from wikipedia. Your better off reading a cheap book from the library.
reviews.author: Zachary Coester

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Great resource all in one place. Love it
reviews.author: david jones

reviews.title: Wiki..
reviews.comment: Not a fan that the info comes from wiki, but I love the photos
reviews.author: Anna Nielsen

reviews.title: Incredible A++++
reviews.comment: Lobe it as an anthropology and archaeology major this is so great to have at hand.
reviews.author: Rende Durham

reviews.title: Great work
reviews.comment: Fantastic
reviews.author: Mat Crissey

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great gathering of fossil images and data. Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Neanderthaldan
reviews.comment: Very good app. One of the other comments suggests some of the included species are known frauds. This is not true and I would like to know which ones you are referring to
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why?
reviews.comment: If Neanderthal had a wide nose and most likely dark skin because those traits are best suited for a cold climate why are the Negroidal peoples situated in hotter climate zones?
reviews.author: Kevin hatchett

reviews.comment: Great app - very useful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Informative
reviews.comment: Although it seems its just saved Wikipedia information. It\'s well linked and presented in an easy to use format. Great presentation of Human Evolution.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Promotes bad science
reviews.comment: Full of assumptions and proven frauds. The fact that there is still a missing link proving men evolved from apes does not seem to bother them. This is promoting a world view and a religion and is not science.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Just cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: It revitalized my interest in physical anthropology and human evolution! The sliding timeline is great. Looking forward to seeing updates :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb App
reviews.comment: Great pocket guide to our human ancestry.  Even has Wikipedia links for more info.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not compatible with Galaxy Nexus.
reviews.comment: Very very slow and unresponsive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fab
reviews.comment: This app is helping me through my anthropology exams very nicely. Love it!
reviews.author: A Google User
